description: Current Geek, with Scott Johnson and Tom Merritt, covers the most interesting geeky stories with great guests and YOU!
title: Current Geek

episodes.title: CGC 109: The Appendix!
episodes.description: We take the season that was, and turn it into a roundup with Scott, Tom, Rich and Hammond!

episodes.title: CGC 108: Why CGI Cant Do Everything...Yet
episodes.description: CGC 108: Why CGI Cant Do Everything...Yet. Mo-cap, CG, big stuff, subtle stuff…it’s all amazing, but will we ever get to a place where CGI just simply does it all? Maybe. Tune in and see if we get closer to that answer!

episodes.title: CGC 107: One Connection To Rule Them All
episodes.description: From serial and parallel to SCSI and IDE to firewire and USB-C, today's episode dives deep into the history of connectivity, and why it took so long to get where we are, as fast as we are.

episodes.title: CGC 106: Before E Was For Everyone
episodes.description: Before E Was For Everyone. Remember the early 90's and a little game called Mortal Kombat? Well, it sorta changed the video game world forever, and created a whole new stir among parents, gamers, and the government! We tackle that time and see what we can suss out of it, and look at what has actually changed!

episodes.title: CGC 105: The Reality of Reality TV
episodes.description: The stories about how reality TV gets made, and how the people who make it and edit get to what we call the final product. Is any of it real? We go deep and take a peek.

episodes.title: CGC 104: Zoom And Enhance!
episodes.description: Why is Zoom and Enhance a thing, and where did it come from? Have we EVER been able to do it? Are we able to do it now? The answers my surprise you!

episodes.title: CGC 103: The Theremin Is For Chumps
episodes.description: The Theramin Is For Chumps. Some cool and weird techno instruments that are not the Theramin. Why are we so into alternative instruments, and why are they important? Tom and Scott explore!

episodes.title: CGC 102: A Guide To Wrestling For Outsiders
episodes.description: Scott and Tom try and understand the world of professional wrestling, past and present, and with the help of some professional guests, I think we may have cracked the case!

episodes.title: CGC 101a: Supplimental
episodes.description: A chance to let you know the upcoming episode release schedule! And a bit more with Tom, Scott, Hammond, and Rich!

episodes.title: Our Thanks!
episodes.description: Thank you for helping us hit our goal! The season is coming now!

episodes.title: Current Geek Chronicles 101: Mana: From Heaven to Hearthstone!
episodes.description: As promised, our first Chronicles episode out and ready to listen to after you made Kickstarter happen for us! All about Mana: From Heaven to Hearthstone!
